title: Question 24
prompt: Which method will calculate the total cost of a teaching program for an out-of-state student?
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
Column 
<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mi>o</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
 gives the cost per semester of the teaching programs. Column 
<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mi>p</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
 gives the number of semesters in each teaching program. The total cost of the teaching program is the cost per semester times the number of semesters. The total cost of a teaching program for an out of state student can be found by multiplying 
<math><mtable><mtr><mtd><mi>p</mi><mo>×</mo><mi>o</mi></mtd></mtr></mtable></math>
.
